scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a discussion of farm life without electricity and a smell of kerosene on hands (p. 1-4), discussion of experience working as a waitress in Cincinnati as well as labor and class issues in Cincinnati (p. 4-20), discussion and critique of Berea (p. 21-26 and 51-60), notes on Arnow's time at a boarding school and town life (p. 27-51), discussion of experiences teaching in several schools and the poverty and attitudes of students and their families (p. 60-82), and a discussion of experiences as a student at the University of Louisville (p. 83-92).
